solution_line_template: Each breakfast plate has {eggs_per_plate} x {bacon_multiplier} = <<{eggs_per_plate}*{bacon_multiplier}={bacon_strips_per_plate}>>{bacon_strips_per_plate} bacon strips.
The cook needs to fry {num_customers} x {bacon_strips_per_plate} = <<{num_customers}*{bacon_strips_per_plate}={total_bacon_strips}>>{total_bacon_strips} bacon strips.
